data.quote: Try not to become a man of success but rather to become a man of value.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: You may delay, but time will not.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: I can resist everything except temptation.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: I can resist everything except temptation.

data.quote: We have nothing to fear but fear itself.
data.author: President Franklin D. Roosevelt
